headline.main: FROM THE LOWER POTOMAC.; Important Statements Concerning the Rebel Force and Positions on the Potomac--Situation of Some of their Batteries--Number of Guns, &c.

docs.abstract: Reports on Confederate positions on lower Potomac
docs.lead_paragraph: Four contrabands have escaped from across the river; their names are MANUEL WILKINS, GEMMA COOK, WASHINGTON ROBINSON and RICHARD STAIR. They have furnished the most important information of any contrabands that have ever left the enemy's lines. I herewith send you their statements.

docs.snippet: This place is obtaining a prominence and importance of no factitious character, and during the few days which I have passed here, I lave learned much respecting the affairs of the island which should be of interest to the public.

docs.lead_paragraph: The whole session of the House last evening was occupied in discussing a bill relative to the Oneida Lake Canal, From what little of the debate bore any relation to the subject matter of the bill, it would seem that the locks on that Canal are in a dilapidated condition.
